snippet.title: AQUA KITTY DX - PS4 and PSVita trailer
snippet.description:
AQUA KITTY - Milk Mine Defender rises up onto PlayStation in this special DX edition. Available from the 25/26 Nov 2014 with CrossBuy, defend the milk mining kittens - the MILK MUST FLOW!

Key upgrades to this version compared to the original are:
New big Bosses and extra enemies.
New and reworked levels.
Easy mode if you want to take things easy.
Arcade mode which plays like Defender mixed with Gradius.
Enhanced artwork and visual effects!
New directional weapons.

PS4: 2 player local coop, controller light and sound effects, 1080p 60hz graphics (actually rendered at 4k on the GPU).

Check out www.tikipod.com for more information!
